#summary LOST Project main page.

= Introduction =

Welcome to the LOST project (!LeBomb hOme System Terminal).
This project is dedicated to home automation.



= Details =

This is based on a simple concept:
  * [LOST_Server_Main A centralized board : LOST Server]
  * [LOST_Nodes_Main Some intelligent nodes : LOST Node]

Everything is accessible through a Web Interface

The centralized board is in charge of :
  * Home Safety
  * Home Security
  * Alert (GSM, Email, Buzzer)
  * Scenario management
  * Command and Control dispatch

= Architecture =
All the system is based on a I2C bus. It has many advantages :
  * Standard
  * Low Cost
  * Widely used
  * Short cut tolerant
